Alfred Schnittke - Concerto for Piano and Strings

Performed October 11th, 2023 at Neidorff-Karpati Hall, Manhattan School of Music.

Concerto debut with Conductor David Chan, concertmaster of the Met, and OPUS130, as a winner of the Eisenberg-Fried Concerto Competition

[composition] The Year Has Flown By (2022)

Fragments After Haiku for Alto Flute (doubling Flute in C), Baritone, and Piano. Harlem, NY.

Premiered April 18, 2022 at Ades Performance Space, Manhattan School of Music.

Savannah Mae Gentry, flutes
Gabriel Garcia, baritone
Arthur Siyun Li, piano

零. a clearing /
一. (between each wave / my children / disappear)
二. son dews over / open mouths
三. hatsu yuki ya / suisen no ha no / tawamu made
四. you gather / chrysanthemums
